question: Two pipes A and B can separately fill a tank in 2 hours and 3 hours respectively. If both the pipes are opened simultaneously in the empty tank, then the tank will be filled in:
explanation:
Part of the tank filled by pipe A and B in 1 hour
$latex = \\frac{1}{2}+\\frac{1}{3}=\\frac{3+2}{6} = \\frac{5}{6}\\ parts&s=1$
âˆ´ Required Time $latex = \\frac{6}{5}\\ hours&s=1$
$latex = 1\\ hour\\ \\frac{1}{5}\\times 60 = 12\\ minutes.&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer.
